T03bsa050_u:709: ādhyātmikāyatanaśeṣam aśeṣam evam ātmīyavastuviṣayo 'pi ca tadvivekī // Ps_6.58 //
T03bsa050_u:710: bāhyeṣu dhātuṣu śarīrasamāśritānāṃ nālpo 'pi lakṣaṇavirodhakṛto 'sti bhedaḥ /
T03bsa050_u:711: vijñānadhāturapi ca kṣaṇikaḥ sa nātmā tasmātparo 'pi ca nabhaḥkusumaiḥ samānaḥ // Ps_6.59 //
T03bsa050_u:712: ityetadudbhavati kevalameva duḥkhaṃ tṛṣṇāvimūḍhamanaso vigmāttu tasyāḥ /
T03bsa050_u:713: śāntiḥ parā bhavati tarṣaharastu mārgaḥ śīlaṃ samādhipariśuddhatayā ca dṛṣṭiḥ // Ps_6.60 //
T03bsa050_u:714: tattatpratītya bhavatīti viśuddhadṛṣṭirnāstyasti veti samupaiti sa naiva kiṃ cit /
T03bsa050_u:715: māyāmayaṃ jagadidaṃ pratibhāti tasya tasmāt sukhādiṣu bhavatyavikāradhīraḥ // Ps_6.61 //
T03bsa050_u:716: āsīdbhaviṣyati ca yat tad apīdṛgeva kaḥ saṃbhavo yadasukhaṃ na bhaved bhavebhyaḥ /
T03bsa050_u:717: evaṃ vyatītaviṣayeṣvapi vītarāgo naivābhinandati bhavāṃśca bhaviṣyato 'pi // Ps_6.62 //
T03bsa050_u:719: tatpraiṣyavṛttikapaṭānyanucintya rajyed viśvāsameva ca yathocitamatra yāyāt // Ps_6.63 //
T03bsa050_u:721: hīneṣu niṣpraṇayabuddhirudārabhāvān nirvātumicchati na buddhaguṇānalabdhvā // Ps_6.64 //
T03bsa050_u:724: hīnociteṣu na matirnamati praṇītā saṃtiṣṭhate mahati nāmahatī kadā cit /
T03bsa050_u:725: saṃsyandate śucibhireva śucisvabhāvaṃ tulyaistathānyadapi śāsvata eṣa yogaḥ // Ps_6.66 //
T03bsa050_u:726: svapnopamāni vigaṇayya sukhāsukhāni saṃmohadoṣakṛpaṇāṃ janatāṃ ca teṣu /
T03bsa050_u:727: ātmārtha eva gurutāṃ katham asya yāyād vyāpārabhāramavadhūya parārtharamyam // Ps_6.67 //
T03bsa050_u:729: sarvatra śāntamatiradvayamārgacārī so 'tyadbhutaścaritanirvṛta eva loke // Ps_6.68 //
T03bsa050_u:731: lokasya yā nayanatāmiva saṃprayāti dīptāṃśumaṇḍalatalotpatitā prabheva // Ps_6.69 //
T03bsa050_u:733: nātmābhikhedapariviklavatāṃ sa yāti yānasya buddhaguṇasaṃjananasya loke // Ps_6.70 //
T03bsa050_u:735: tadgāminaṃ pariharanti ca yānamārgaṃ kiṃ nāma kāraṇamṛte śaṭhaceṣṭitebhyaḥ // Ps_6.71 //
T03bsa050_u:737: sarvajñayānamapayānam anarthapaṅkād ākroṣṭumarhati na cejjagato 'sya vairam // Ps_6.72 //
T03bsa050_u:739: cittaṃ narasya karuṇāmṛdu kasya na syāt tanmohadoṣaśamanāya dṛḍhaṃ ca vīryam // Ps_6.73 //
T03bsa050_u:740: prajñāyā janayati yaḥ parāṃ viśuddhiṃ nirmokṣaḥ kathamiva tasya dūrataḥ syāt /
T03bsa050_u:741: naivāsmātparataramasti śīlam anyat tattasmād bhajata vimokṣakāṅkṣiṇo hi // Ps_6.74 //
